name: Avatar.Root

delayMs.description: How long to wait before showing the image after it has loaded. This can be useful to prevent a harsh flickering effect when the image loads quickly.
delayMs.description_zh: How long to wait before showing the image after it has loaded. This can be useful to prevent a harsh flickering effect when the image loads quickly.

loadingStatus.description: The loading status of the avatars source image. You can bind a variable to track the status outside of the component and use it to show a loading indicator or error message.
loadingStatus.description_zh: The loading status of the avatars source image. You can bind a variable to track the status outside of the component and use it to show a loading indicator or error message.

onLoadingStatusChange.description: A callback function called when the loading status of the image changes.
onLoadingStatusChange.description_zh: A callback function called when the loading status of the image changes.

asChild.description: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.
asChild.description_zh: Whether to use render delegation with this component or not.

el.description: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.
el.description_zh: The underlying DOM element being rendered. You can bind to this to programatically interact with the element.

description: The root component used to set and manage the state of the avatar.

slots.name: attrs
slots.description: Additional attributes to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
slots.description_zh: Additional attributes to apply to the element if using the asChild prop with delegation.
